claim_card.claim: A 90-day, falsifiable benchmark protocol is defined to test whether NT + distance-ratio rhythm can beat DNS on lead-time, RMSE, and GPU cost.
claim_card.test_hook: Run the 90-day phases end-to-end and report lead-time, RMSE, and GPU hours side-by-side vs DNS baseline.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: a 90-day, falsifiable protocol that bets on Narrative Ticks (NTs) and their distance-ratio rhythm to beat DNS
